Posts.Content: Hi am 43 and i also just had my first mammogram. On Thursday and Friday they callme say that the radiologist what more pictures of my left breast. They tell you not to worry but i am a little worried. Is uncommon for them to call back so soon and not tell you why they want more pictures?
Posts.Title: scared...called back for "routine follow up" after 1st ever mammogram

Posts.Content: Thank you Bev its hard but im trying not to worry.
Posts.Title: scared...called back for "routine follow up" after 1st ever mammogram
